info.name: Logo Maker API - Complete Comprehensive Documentation
info.description:
üöÄ **Complete Logo Maker API Documentation with ALL Possible Attributes**

## Overview
This collection contains comprehensive examples for the Logo Maker API with every possible attribute for each layer type.

## Features
- **Complete Layer Examples**: Every possible attribute for TEXT, SHAPE, ICON, IMAGE, BACKGROUND layers
- **Mobile-Compatible Format**: Both standard and mobile API formats
- **All Blend Modes**: Complete list of blend modes and their usage
- **Comprehensive Attributes**: Every possible property documented with examples
- **Real-world Examples**: Complete logo with all layer types and attributes

## Base URL
`{{baseUrl}}` (default: http://localhost:3000/api)

## Layer Types Supported
- **TEXT**: Rich text with fonts, stroke, shadows, gradients
- **SHAPE**: Geometric shapes with all possible properties
- **ICON**: SVG icons with dynamic coloring and transformations
- **IMAGE**: Raster images with crop, filters, transformations
- **BACKGROUND**: Solid colors, gradients, images, patterns

## All Possible Attributes Included
- Position, scale, rotation, opacity, flip
- Blend modes, shadows, anchors
- Type-specific properties for each layer
- Legacy and modern API formats
- Mobile-optimized configurations

request.description: Check if the API server is running and healthy.
Create a complete logo with ALL possible attributes for every layer type. This example demonstrates every feature available in the Logo Maker API.

exec: console.log('Complete logo created with ID:', response.data.id);

request.description: Create a mobile-optimized logo using the mobile API format with all possible attributes.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Text Layer Example",
  "canvas": {
    "aspectRatio": 1.0,
    "background": {
      "type": "solid",
      "solidColor": "#ffffff"
    }
  },
  "layers": [
    {
      "layerId": "text-layer-001",
      "type": "text",
      "visible": true,
      "order": 0,
      "position": { "x": 0.5, "y": 0.5 },
      "scaleFactor": 1.0,
      "rotation": 0.0,
      "opacity": 1.0,
      "flip": { "horizontal": false, "vertical": false },
      "anchor_x": 0.5,
      "anchor_y": 0.5,
      "blend_mode": "normal",
      "is_visible": true,
      "is_locked": false,
      "common_style": {
        "shadow": {
          "dx": 2,
          "dy": 2,
          "blur": 6,
          "hex": "#000000",
          "alpha": 0.5
        }
      },
      "text": {
        "value": "Complete Text Example",
        "font": "Helvetica",
        "fontColor": "#000000",
        "fontWeight": "bold",
        "fontStyle": "normal",
        "alignment": "center",
        "lineHeight": 1.2,
        "letterSpacing": 2,
        "fontSize": 48,
        "font_id": "font-asset-uuid",
        "baseline": "alphabetic",
        "fill_hex": "#000000",
        "fill_alpha": 1.0,
        "stroke_hex": "#ffffff",
        "stroke_alpha": 0.8,
        "stroke_width": 2,
        "stroke_align": "outside",
        "gradient": {
          "type": "linear",
          "angle": 90,
          "stops": [
            { "offset": 0, "hex": "#ff0000", "alpha": 1.0 },
            { "offset": 1, "hex": "#0000ff", "alpha": 1.0 }
          ]
        }
      }
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Example of a TEXT layer with ALL possible attributes including fonts, stroke, shadows, gradients, and all text properties.
Example of a SHAPE layer with ALL possible attributes including shapes, stroke, gradients, corner radius, and all shape properties.
Example of an ICON layer with ALL possible attributes including source, tinting, recoloring, and all icon properties.
Example of an IMAGE layer with ALL possible attributes including crop, fit modes, filters, brightness, contrast, and all image properties.
Example of a BACKGROUND layer with ALL possible attributes including solid colors, gradients, images, repeat modes, positioning, and all background properties.
Get a layer by ID with all its properties and type-specific data.
Update common layer properties including position, scale, rotation, opacity, blend mode, flip, anchor, and shadow effects.
Update text layer with ALL possible text attributes including content, font, size, colors, stroke, alignment, and spacing.
Update shape layer with ALL possible shape attributes including type, fill, stroke, corner radius, dash patterns, line caps, and custom properties.
Update icon layer with ALL possible icon attributes including asset reference, tint color, opacity, and recoloring options.
Update image layer with ALL possible image attributes including crop, fit mode, rounding, blur, brightness, and contrast adjustments.
Update background layer with ALL possible background attributes including mode, colors, gradients, repeat, position, and size.
